activities: Protected Trust, LLC, directly or via its wholly-owned subsidiaries, may receive Personal Information (PI) from our clients, guest users, visitors, and/or business partners (collectively, "users"), which we use to offer and provide them our software and services.  Users may choose to submit PI to us via email, our website(s), telephone, or by uploading it to our servers in connection with obtaining or using our products and services.
